identity.name: com.ibm.streamsx.inetserver
identity.description:
The Internet Server Toolkit provides support HTTP- and Websocket-Server functions. The functionality is based on an embedded jetty webserver. It may be used for rest protocol and web socket protocol applications. The toolkit origin is a split from internet toolkit streamsx.inet 2.9.6
This toolkit separates its functionality into a number of namespaces: * [namespace:com.ibm.streamsx.inet.rest|com.ibm.streamsx.inet.rest]: Operators that embed a (jetty) HTTP server to provide a REST-style API to streaming data. * [namespace:com.ibm.streamsx.inet.wsserver|com.ibm.streamsx.inet.wsserver]: Operators that embed a (jetty) WebSocket server to expose streaming data as WebSocket messages.
